Texts.Eng: A Union flag. I can use this as a waypoint for teleportation.
A locator module inside this Union flag allows my ship's teleporter to bookmark this location.
A small locator module attached to this Union flag allows it to be bookmarked for teleportation.
An Union flag. I can bookmark its location so my teleporter can return me here at any time.
An Union flag. I can save its location for my teleporter, allowing me to return here later.
Flag of Union-Aegi, colourful and pretty.
I can bookmark this Union flag for quick teleportin'.
The Union flag. My ship's teleporter can sync with its location so I can return here later.
The Union flag. The ship's teleporter can lock on to the locator module inside it, so I can return here later.
The flag of the Aeginian Federal Union. Use ^green;[E]^white; to bookmark a teleportation location.
The flag of the Union people. My teleporter can bookmark its location for later use.
The flag of the Union. I can save its location and return to it later using my teleporter.
This Union flag can act as a way point, enabling me to return to this point using a teleporter.
This Union flag can be bookmarked as a destination for my ship teleporter.
This Union flag can be saved as a location for my teleporter. Then I can return to it any time.
Union flag makess good point to teleport back to ussing teleporter!
Union flag. Detected locator module. Ship teleportation system can lock on to this location.
